field.name: startnum
field.label: Start Number
field.description: The counter will start to count from this number.

field.name: interval
field.label: Interval
field.description: This number is used to control the speed of counter animation.

field.name: increment
field.label: Increment
field.description: The number is used to increament the number by this value for each hit. (visit count = increament * hits)
